# Code of Conduct

## Our Pledge

In the interest of fostering an open and welcoming environment, we as contributors and leaders pledge to make participation in our project and our community a harassment-free experience for everyone.

## Enforcement

Instances of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be reported by contacting the project team at **tarantula.tech@atomicmail.io**. All complaints will be reviewed and investigated and will result in a response that is deemed necessary and appropriate to the circumstances.
